remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个类似于方法调用线程本地存储的专用的集合对象，并提供对执行的每个逻辑线程是唯一的数据槽。 is a specialized collection object similar to a Thread Local Storage for method calls and provides data slots that are unique to each logical thread of execution. 槽不共享跨其他逻辑线程上调用上下文中。The slots are not shared across call contexts on other logical threads. 可以将对象添加到往返传播了执行代码路径，并且检查由各种对象的路径。Objects can be added to the as it travels down and back up the execution code path, and examined by various objects along the path. 当在另一个对象进行远程方法调用、类生成与远程调用一起传播的实例。When a remote method call is made to an object in another , the class generates a instance that travels along with the remote call. 仅对象公开接口，并存储在外部传播中。Only objects that expose the interface and are stored in the are propagated outside the in a . 不支持此接口的对象不会传输中带有远程方法调用的实例。Objects that do not support this interface are not transmitted in instances with remote method calls. > [!NOTE] > 中的所有方法是静态的运行在当前调用上下文。All methods in are static and operate on the call context in the current . > [!NOTE] > 此类，使链接要求。This class makes a link demand. A`SecurityException`如果直接调用方没有基础结构的权限，则引发。A `SecurityException` is thrown if the immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission. 请参阅[链接需求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)有关详细信息。See [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) for more information. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将类传输[主体和标识对象](~/docs/standard/security/principal-and-identity-objects.md)到远程位置以进行标识。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class to transmit [Principal and Identity Objects](~/docs/standard/security/principal-and-identity-objects.md) to a remote location for identification. 若要查看的代码`LogicalCallContextData`类使用在此示例中，请参阅例如接口。To view the code for the `LogicalCallContextData` class used in this sample, see the example for the interface. 若要查看的代码`HelloServiceClass`类使用在此示例中，请参阅例如方法。To view the code for the `HelloServiceClass` class used in this sample, see the example for the method. 若要查看此示例中使用的服务器类的代码，请参阅示例类。To view the code for the server class used in this sample, see the example for the class.
